text: Revenge is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on May 14, 1992. == Track listing == * Unholy * Take It Off * Tough Love * Spit * God Gave Rock 'N' Roll To You II * Domino * Heart Of Chrome * Thou Shalt Not * Every Time I Look At You * Paralyzed * I Just Wanna * Carr Jam 1981 Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1992 albums
title: Revenge (album)
